$$
y = \beta_0 + \beta_1 x + u
$$

$$
\hat{\beta}_1 = \frac{\sum (x_i - \bar{x})(y_i - \bar{y})}{\sum (x_i - \bar{x})^2}, 
\quad 
\hat{\beta}_0 = \bar{y} - \hat{\beta}_1 \bar{x}
$$

$$
SST = SSE + SSR
$$
$$
R^2 = 1 - \frac{SSR}{SST} \qquad \overline{R}^2=1-\frac{SSR/(n-k-1)}{SST/(n-1)}
$$

$$
Var(\hat{\beta}|X) = \frac{\sigma^2}{\sum (x-\overline{x})^2}
$$
$$
\hat{\sigma}^2 = \frac{SSR}{n-k-1}
$$


$$
t = \frac{\hat{\beta}_j - \beta_{j,0}}{se(\hat{\beta}_j)}
$$

:::{.column}
$$
F = \frac{(SSR_{r} - SSR_{ur})/q}{SSR_{ur}/(n-k-1)}
$$
:::

:::{.column}

$$
F = \frac{(R^2_{ur} - R^2_{r})/q}{(1 - R^2_{ur})/(n-k-1)}
$$

$$
\hat{\beta}_1^{IV} = \frac{\sum z_i y_i}{\sum z_i x_i}
$$
